price: Ata nuk do të kenë ndërmjetës nga idhujt e vet dhe do t’i mohojnë idhujt e tyre.
arabic: وَلَمۡ يَكُن لَّهُم مِّن شُرَكَآئِهِمۡ شُفَعَٰٓؤُاْ وَكَانُواْ بِشُرَكَآئِهِمۡ كَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: walam yakun lahum min shurakāihim shufaʿāu wakānū bishurakāihim kāfirīna
